input.sentences: two women standing by a car .
a person running on the road .
output.sentences: I took a picture with a woman standing by my car who had just completed the marathon.
I saw this person running by the road.
Smiling at me, the woman introduced herself.
I'm always excited to meet athletic women, so we took a picture of us hugging after the marathon.
Afterwords, me and some other women went to get food to eat.
